original_text: But when Saul saw and knew that the Lord was with David, and that Michal, Saul's daughter, loved him,
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗과 함께 계심을 사울이 보고 알았고 사울의 딸 미갈도 그를 사랑하므로

sentences.original_text: But when Saul saw and knew
that the Lord was with David
and that Michal, Saul's daughter, loved him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사울의 딸 미갈이 그를 사랑한다는 것을
